verses.text: \w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H7227"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w persecuted|strong="H6887"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3478"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*— \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* declare—

\w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H7227"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w persecuted|strong="H6887"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H1571"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H3201"\w* \w against|strong="H1571"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* plowmen \w plowed|strong="H2790"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H1354"\w*; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* made \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w furrows|strong="H4618"\w* \w long|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H7112"\w* me \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

May \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H5472"\w* \w in|strong="H3605"\w* shame.

\w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H1406"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w rooftops|strong="H1406"\w*, \w which|strong="H2682"\w* \w withers|strong="H3001"\w* \w before|strong="H6927"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* can grow,

\w unable|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w reaper|strong="H7114"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* arms \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w binder|strong="H6014"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w sheaves|strong="H6014"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5674"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”
